mapper.delete: DELETE FROM COMMENTS WHERE cmt_brd_no=#{cmtBrdNo} and cmt_no=#{cmtNo} and cmt_writer_no=#{memNo}
mapper.select: SELECT c.cmt_no, c.cmt_writer_no, c.cmt_content, c.cmt_brd_no, c.cmt_created_at, m.mem_nickname, mi.img_path, a.address_si, a.address_gu, a.address_dong FROM COMMENTS c left OUTER join MEMBER m on c.cmt_writer_no=m.mem_no left OUTER join MEMBER_IMAGE mi on c.cmt_writer_no=mi.mem_no left OUTER join ADDRESS a on c.cmt_writer_no=a.mem_no WHERE cmt_brd_no=#{brdNo} and a.address_no = ( select max(aa.address_no) from address aa where aa.mem_no=c.cmt_writer_no ) ORDER BY cmt_no desc
select count(*) from COMMENTS where cmt_brd_no=#{brdNo} and cmt_writer_no=#{memNo} and rownum<=1
select count(*) from COMMENTS where cmt_brd_no=#{brdNo}
